about_the_game:
Five tales of the Bondmaids that we learn during the visits of the Sorceress to Misallyna.

Tales written by Trude Perkins for the Book of Bondmaids - were not included in the main game.

You can expect:

1. The Goodwife’s Tale
2. The Captain’s Tale
3. The Widow’s Tale
4. The Musician's Tale
5. The Physician's Tale

It's integrated in the game (talk to Misallyna) and provided as a simple text as well - for reading separately (grom the main menu).

content_descriptors.notes:
DLC contains description of sex scenes with full nudity.
BDSM, LGBT, Heterosexual scenes.

detailed_description:
WISHLIST


About the Game

Five tales of the Bondmaids that we learn during the visits of the Sorceress to Misallyna.

Tales written by Trude Perkins for the Book of Bondmaids - were not included in the main game.

You can expect:

1. The Goodwife’s Tale
2. The Captain’s Tale
3. The Widow’s Tale
4. The Musician's Tale
5. The Physician's Tale

It's integrated in the game (talk to Misallyna) and provided as a simple text as well - for reading separately (grom the main menu).

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 2.2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 3850 or NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GS
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supporting DirectX

short_description: Five tales of the Bondmaids from Trude Perkins that we learn during the visits of the Sorceress to Misallyna. For those, who have wish to read exotic tales.
